event.descr:
The appliance is in the process of rebooting. The name of the user who initiated the reboot is contained in amx5010TrapObjectUserName. If the reboot is initated from via snmp , then the value of this object will be the following string snmpUser

amx5010TrapObjectUserName %parm[#1]%;

A connection between a UserStation and an Amiq device has been established. The Uid of the UserStation involved in the connection is contained in amx5010TrapObjectUserStationUid. The Uid of the Amiq device involved in the connection is contained in amx5010TrapObjectAmiqUid. The connection mode of the connection is contained in amx5010TrapObjectAmiqConnectMode

amx5010TrapObjectUserStationUid %parm[#1]%;

amx5010TrapObjectAmiqUid %parm[#2]%;

amx5010TrapObjectAmiqConnectMode %parm[#3]%;

nspmNONE(1) nspmSHARED(2) nspmPRIVATE(3) nspmMAINTAIN(4)

A connection between a UserStation and an Amiq device has been disconnected. The Uid of the UserStation involved in the connection is contained in amx5010TrapObjectUserStationUid.

amx5010TrapObjectUserStationUid %parm[#1]%;

An AMIQ device has been connected to the AMX. The Uid of the Amiq device connected to the AMX is contained in amx5010TrapObjectAmiqUid. The name of the Amiq device connected to the AMX is contained in amx5010TrapObjectAmiqName. The PortNum of the Amiq device connected to the AMX is contained in amx5010TrapObjectAmiqPortNum.

amx5010TrapObjectAmiqUid %parm[#1]%;

amx5010TrapObjectAmiqName %parm[#2]%;

amx5010TrapObjectAmiqPortNum %parm[#3]%;

portNumUserSide1(1) portNumUserSide2(2) portNumUserSide3(3) portNumUserSide4(4) portNumUserSide5(5) portNumUserSide6(6) portNumUserSide7(7) portNumUserSide8(8) portNumUserSide9(9) portNumUserSide10(10) portNumUserSide11(11) portNumUserSide12(12) portNumUserSide13(13) portNumUserSide14(14) portNumUserSide15(15) portNumUserSide16(16) portNumAmiqSide1(129) portNumAmiqSide2(130) portNumAmiqSide3(131) portNumAmiqSide4(132) portNumAmiqSide5(133) portNumAmiqSide6(134) portNumAmiqSide7(135) portNumAmiqSide8(136) portNumAmiqSide9(137) portNumAmiqSide10(138) portNumAmiqSide11(139) portNumAmiqSide12(140) portNumAmiqSide13(141) portNumAmiqSide14(142) portNumAmiqSide15(143) portNumAmiqSide16(144) portNumAmiqSide17(145) portNumAmiqSide18(146) portNumAmiqSide19(147) portNumAmiqSide20(148) portNumAmiqSide21(149) portNumAmiqSide22(150) portNumAmiqSide23(151) portNumAmiqSide24(152) portNumAmiqSide25(153) portNumAmiqSide26(154) portNumAmiqSide27(155) portNumAmiqSide28(156) portNumAmiqSide29(157) portNumAmiqSide30(158) portNumAmiqSide31(159) portNumAmiqSide32(160) portNumAmiqSide33(161) portNumAmiqSide34(162) portNumAmiqSide35(163) portNumAmiqSide36(164) portNumAmiqSide37(165) portNumAmiqSide38(166) portNumAmiqSide39(167) portNumAmiqSide40(168) portNumAmiqSide41(169) portNumAmiqSide42(170) portNumAmiqSide43(171) portNumAmiqSide44(172) portNumAmiqSide45(173) portNumAmiqSide46(174) portNumAmiqSide47(175) portNumAmiqSide48(176) portNumAmiqSide49(177) portNumAmiqSide50(178) portNumAmiqSide51(179) portNumAmiqSide52(180) portNumAmiqSide53(181) portNumAmiqSide54(182) portNumAmiqSide55(183) portNumAmiqSide56(184) portNumAmiqSide57(185) portNumAmiqSide58(186) portNumAmiqSide59(187) portNumAmiqSide60(188) portNumAmiqSidet61(189) portNumAmiqSide62(190) portNumAmiqSide63(191) portNumAmiqSide64(192) portNumNULL(255)

An AMIQ device has been disconnected from the AMX. The Uid of the Amiq device disconnected from the AMX is contained in amx5010TrapObjectAmiqUid.

amx5010TrapObjectAmiqUid %parm[#1]%;

A UserStation has been connected to the AMX. The Uid of the UserStation connected to the AMX is contained in amx5010TrapObjectUserStationUid. The name of the UserStation connected to the AMX is contained in amx5010TrapObjectUserStationName. The PortNum of the UserStation connected to the AMX is contained in amx5010TrapObjectUserStnPortNum.

amx5010TrapObjectUserStationUid %parm[#1]%;

amx5010TrapObjectUserStationName %parm[#2]%;

amx5010TrapObjectUserStnPortNum %parm[#3]%;

portNumUserSide1(1) portNumUserSide2(2) portNumUserSide3(3) portNumUserSide4(4) portNumUserSide5(5) portNumUserSide6(6) portNumUserSide7(7) portNumUserSide8(8) portNumUserSide9(9) portNumUserSide10(10) portNumUserSide11(11) portNumUserSide12(12) portNumUserSide13(13) portNumUserSide14(14) portNumUserSide15(15) portNumUserSide16(16) portNumAmiqSide1(129) portNumAmiqSide2(130) portNumAmiqSide3(131) portNumAmiqSide4(132) portNumAmiqSide5(133) portNumAmiqSide6(134) portNumAmiqSide7(135) portNumAmiqSide8(136) portNumAmiqSide9(137) portNumAmiqSide10(138) portNumAmiqSide11(139) portNumAmiqSide12(140) portNumAmiqSide13(141) portNumAmiqSide14(142) portNumAmiqSide15(143) portNumAmiqSide16(144) portNumAmiqSide17(145) portNumAmiqSide18(146) portNumAmiqSide19(147) portNumAmiqSide20(148) portNumAmiqSide21(149) portNumAmiqSide22(150) portNumAmiqSide23(151) portNumAmiqSide24(152) portNumAmiqSide25(153) portNumAmiqSide26(154) portNumAmiqSide27(155) portNumAmiqSide28(156) portNumAmiqSide29(157) portNumAmiqSide30(158) portNumAmiqSide31(159) portNumAmiqSide32(160) portNumAmiqSide33(161) portNumAmiqSide34(162) portNumAmiqSide35(163) portNumAmiqSide36(164) portNumAmiqSide37(165) portNumAmiqSide38(166) portNumAmiqSide39(167) portNumAmiqSide40(168) portNumAmiqSide41(169) portNumAmiqSide42(170) portNumAmiqSide43(171) portNumAmiqSide44(172) portNumAmiqSide45(173) portNumAmiqSide46(174) portNumAmiqSide47(175) portNumAmiqSide48(176) portNumAmiqSide49(177) portNumAmiqSide50(178) portNumAmiqSide51(179) portNumAmiqSide52(180) portNumAmiqSide53(181) portNumAmiqSide54(182) portNumAmiqSide55(183) portNumAmiqSide56(184) portNumAmiqSide57(185) portNumAmiqSide58(186) portNumAmiqSide59(187) portNumAmiqSide60(188) portNumAmiqSidet61(189) portNumAmiqSide62(190) portNumAmiqSide63(191) portNumAmiqSide64(192) portNumNULL(255)

A UserStation has been disconnected from the AMX. The Uid of the UserStation disconnected from the AMX is contained in amx5010TrapObjectUserStationUid.

amx5010TrapObjectUserStationUid %parm[#1]%;

A User has logged in from a UserStation. The Uid of the UserStation being logged in from is contained in amx5010TrapObjectUserStationUid. The name of the User logged in to the UserStation is contained in amx5010TrapObjectUserStationName.

amx5010TrapObjectUserStationUid %parm[#1]%;

amx5010TrapObjectUserName %parm[#2]%;

A User has logged out from a UserStation. The Uid of the UserStation being logged out from is contained in amx5010TrapObjectUserStationUid.

amx5010TrapObjectUserStationUid %parm[#1]%;
